comment: Really happy that I found this seller. Great communication, works efficient and delivers good quality. And has a sense of humour, My man!
I previously worked with many different web-developers, but Iftikhar stands out on top of the list. I will definitely be using Iftikhar regularly in the future.
The seller is very professional and he did the job according to my requirements. Definitely, I'll hire him again. 100% recomended, will buy again.
Excellent job, as usual. Plus plenty of explanation in outstanding English for me to understand than just be drowned in codes. Highly recommended.
Quality and very good delivery with thorough explanation as requested. Will keep him in my team for the services above what is expected, Definitely use again
